version_description:
• Display better profile for cryptocurrencies.
• Change Crypto Center base currency.
• Allow portfolios to have BTC base currency.
• Displaying cryptocurrencies with higher precision.
• Fixing issue with sharing a portfolio by SMS.
• Move the inverse button (in the Currencies section) to the menu at the top right.

• Display better profile for cryptocurrencies.
• Change Crypto Center base currency.
• Allow portfolios to have BTC base currency.
• Displaying cryptocurrencies with higher precision.
• Fixing issue with sharing a portfolio by SMS.
• Move the inverse button (in the Currencies section) to the menu at the top right.

• Native charts for well-known cryptocurrencies.
• Display better profile for cryptocurrencies.
• Decimal key was missing when you enter Exchange Rate in the position editor.
• Fixing issue with Futures name.
• Adding Portfolio tags, next update you can filter by tags.

• Native charts for well-known cryptocurrencies.
• Display better profile for cryptocurrencies.
• Decimal key was missing when you enter Exchange Rate in the position editor.
• Fixing issue with Futures name.
• Adding Portfolio tags, next update you can filter by tags.

• You can now filter portfolios by tags or tickers. Tag your kids portfolios to see their performance.
• White and Black theme.
• Enhancments when adding events to calendar.
• Fix issue with too much precisions for price-change.
• Fix issue with stock name with &.
• Fix small issues here and there, no need to bug you, contact us for full list of fixes if you wish, it is a loooong list.

• You can now filter portfolios by tags or tickers. Tag your kids portfolios to see their performance.
• White and Black theme.
• Enhancments when adding events to calendar.
• Fix issue with too much precisions for price-change.
• Fix issue with stock name with &.
• Fix small issues here and there, no need to bug you, contact us for full list of fixes if you wish, it is a loooong list.

• StockTwits feed is back.
• Search result is always saved at the top, even if it was somewhere in the list.
• Charts are ploted with the latest price, including the extended hours.
• When writing a note, it is prepopulated with the ticker in the title.
• Adding FDA calendar (check the Resources tab > Tap on the menu at the top right).
• Changing the border color of the profit/loss cells to be a bit subtle.

• StockTwits feed is back.
• Search result is always saved at the top, even if it was somewhere in the list.
• Charts are ploted with the latest price, including the extended hours.
• When writing a note, it is prepopulated with the ticker in the title.
• Adding FDA calendar (check the Resources tab > Tap on the menu at the top right).
• Changing the border color of the profit/loss cells to be a bit subtle.

• Introducing Tradergram. A powerful, yet simple, sharing tool for your trading performance. Tap on any company, then tap at the top right menu to test it out.
• Search result is always saved at the top, even if it was somewhere in the list.
• Charts are ploted with the latest price, including the extended hours.

• Introducing Tradergram. A powerful, yet simple, sharing tool for your trading performance. Tap on any company, then tap at the top right menu to test it out.
• Search result is always saved at the top, even if it was somewhere in the list.
• Charts are ploted with the latest price, including the extended hours.

• Tradergram can now save animated chart as short movie!
• Display tweets with extended text.
• Fixing issue with iPad popup menus.
• Fixing truncation issue with crypto.

• Tradergram can now save animated chart as short movie!
• Display tweets with extended text.
• Fixing issue with iPad popup menus.
• Fixing truncation issue with crypto.

• Adding Canadian earnings to the Activities > Calendar.
• Numbers view now display some fields that were dropped (50MA, 200MA, Forward PE).
• Adding our favorite books to the Education Center.

• Adding Canadian earnings to the Activities > Calendar.
• Numbers view now display some fields that were dropped (50MA, 200MA, Forward PE).
• Adding our favorite books to the Education Center.

• Adding Merge command to the watch list tab (so you can merge watch lists together).
• Adding new fields to the Numbers view (Price/Sales, Year performance).
• Allow change of base currency in the Activities > Currencies view.

• Adding Merge command to the watch list tab (so you can merge watch lists together).
• Adding new fields to the Numbers view (Price/Sales, Year performance).
• Allow change of base currency in the Activities > Currencies view.

• New IPO Center. Set IPO date alerts, see Pricings, Upcoming, Filings and Withdrawn.
• Fix an issue with closing short positions.

• New IPO Center. Set IPO date alerts, see Pricings, Upcoming, Filings and Withdrawn.
• Fix an issue with closing short positions.

• New IPO Center. Set IPO date alerts, see Pricings, Upcoming, Filings and Withdrawn.
• Fix an issue with closing short positions.

• New IPO Center. Set IPO date alerts, see Pricings, Upcoming, Filings and Withdrawn.
• Fix an issue with closing short positions.
Bug fixing.
Bug fixing.

• Better support for South Africa exchange.
• Double tap on the Tradergram view will select all the range.

• Better support for South Africa exchange.
• Double tap on the Tradergram view will select all the range.

• Adding Analyst Ratings and Price Target (by TipRanks) in the Numbers View.
• Double tap on the Tradergram view will select all the range.
• Fixing bug in the tutorial page (missing images was added).

• Adding Analyst Ratings and Price Target (by TipRanks) in the Numbers View.
• Double tap on the Tradergram view will select all the range.
• Fixing bug in the tutorial page (missing images was added).

• Adding Analyst Ratings and Price Target (by TipRanks) in the Numbers View.
• Double tap on the Tradergram view will select all the range.
• Fixing issue when the change of price is more than a (-/+)1000.

• Double tap on the Tradergram view will select all the range.
• Fixing issue when the change of price is more than a (-/+)1000.

• Enhance upcoming dividend in case the history of dividend is too old.
• Adding Analyst Ratings and Price Target (by TipRanks) in the Numbers View.

• We made new tutorials (with videos coming weekly).  Please check out Resources tab > Store.
• We made new tutorials (with videos coming weekly).  Please check out Resources tab > Store.

• We made new tutorials (with videos coming weekly). Please check out Resources tab > Store.
• Fixing a crash when you tap on the Pie Chart, sorry guys, will never happen again.

• We made new tutorials (with videos coming weekly). Please check out Resources tab > Store.
• Fixing a crash when you tap on the Pie Chart, sorry guys, will never happen again.

• Fixing Tradergram issue with iOS 13. To access Tradergram, tap on any company then tap at the top right menu.
• Fixing font in the twitter view.
• Fixing menu color for in-app purchase.

• Fixing Tradergram issue with iOS 13. To access Tradergram, tap on any company then tap at the top right menu.
• Fixing font in the twitter view.
• Fixing menu color for in-app purchase.

• TipRank will accept more tickers.
• iPad UI modification for the what-if dialog.

• TipRank will accept more tickers.
• iPad UI modification for the what-if dialog.

• Adding Annualized Rate of Return (ARR) to the Profit/Loss view for your portfolios.
• Adding a setting to change the math of ARR between Compound and Simple.

• Adding Annualized Rate of Return (ARR) to the Profit/Loss view for your portfolios.
